Name: Dragonfly Chronicles
About the game: Dragonfly Chronicles is a 2D Action-Adventure game full of challenge and fun for one single player. It's full inspired by old-school 2d games but with modern graphics and sounds, its controls and game mechanics are based in give the player a great challenge and make him feel familiar to those controls of the classic era. Play as Mark West in his path to find what happened to his father and what is The Dragonfly conspiring, make your way through each level, use powerfull skills to destroy deadly enemies and creatures, find different items to reveal more data, play in super fast levels as you escape from exploding facilities and enjoy awesome comic-book cinematic cutscenes!
